attributes.contentHtml:
S T O P
ill explain everything the helio nodes host are too op but the thing is that this thread is pure fake news
exept badsk is somethimes a little bit anoying you see most hosts depends on ads or other things
but IF YOU EVEN HAVE EYES you see that they use arc and they have their own nodes and they give much resources by they win enogh money to mantain the nodes themselves by using arc so whats arc you may ask arc is a cdn that makes web sites faster and they give money if the web sites are visited a lot
so they have a calculator and i can show you what they actually win with arc soo they have 2.5k pepole lets think that 800 pepole are afk 20 hours every month (2 hours per day) and hour haves 3600 seconds so 800 pepole x 20 hours = 16000 pepole being afk 1 hour and if one pepole is afk by 1 hour it equals to 360 pepole being afk for 10 secs and 16000 x 360 = 5760000 Pepole afk by 10 secs and diving that number by 2 = 2880000 pepole afk 20 secs we can calculate how much they win
and now you even think that they re sell falix nodes

attributes.contentHtml: catab12 Just saying "they have arc" does not prove that this thread is not providing real information. Furthermore, you can't earn much money with arc anymore since it has been nerfed, and do you, the guy with the roblox profile picture, seriously think that you just rekt someone by telling them that a host uses arc?

catab12 of course you are wrong, the true is that badsk is a kid that is taking all tokens of all discord accounts of people Who login helio, and use vultr free credit, u can see the proofs on they announcement channels, when they Lost all credit if Sg1.

catab12 You need mental help.
A month has 30/31 days, not 10.
your math is trash, and you don't know anything about how that calculator works, a session is when a user is on your website, they get 2k ish sessions...

catab12 Helio isn't earning $450 a month, that's absurd. I had a conversation with bad and he told me how much he earns from arc.

Ps. use code sebee
